mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_STUDY.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_STUDY (STUDY_NUMBER, STUDY_CATEGORY, STUDY_PROCESS, STUDY_PERSONNEL, STUDY_START, STUDY_COMMUNICATION, STUDY_PERIOD, STUDY_CHIEF, STUDY_TITLE, STUDY_CONTENT, STUDY_MEMBER_NUMBER) VALUES (#{studyNumber}, #{studyCategory}, #{studyProcess}, #{studyPersonnel}, #{studyStart}, #{studyCommunication}, #{studyPeriod}, #{studyChief}, #{studyTitle}, #{studyContent}, #{studyMemberNumber})
